str:Codelist.com:Name: Topic
str:Codelist.com:Description: This codelist provides a high-level categorization of the resource's subject matter, indicating the main area or domain to which the data pertains.

str:Code.com:Name: الديموغرافية والاجتماعية
Демографические и социальные
人口統計・社会
Demographic and social
Démographique et social
Demográfico y social
人口与社会
str:Code.com:Description: Population demographics, social indicators, and labor market statistics.

str:Code.com:Name: أسواق العمل
Рынки труда
労働市場
Labor markets
Marchés du travail
Mercados laborales
劳动力市场
str:Code.com:Description: The labor market, encompassing employment, unemployment, labor force participation, wages, and other labor-related indicators.

str:Code.com:Name: القوى العاملة
Рабочая сила
労働力
Labor force
Population active
Población activa
劳动力
str:Code.com:Description: The total number of people employed and unemployed who are willing and able to work. This provides insights into the size and composition of the workforce and is used to analyze labor market trends and calculate unemployment rates.

str:Code.com:Name: البطالة
Безработица
失業
Unemployment
Chômage
Desempleo
失业
str:Code.com:Description: The number of people who are actively seeking employment but cannot find a job. This is used to calculate the unemployment rate, a key indicator of economic performance and social well-being.

str:Code.com:Name: العمالة
Занятость
雇用
Employment
Emploi
Empleo
就业
str:Code.com:Description: The number of people currently employed, including information on the types of jobs, industries, and occupations.

str:Code.com:Name: الأجور
Заработная плата
賃金
Wages
Salaires
Salarios
工资
str:Code.com:Description: The earnings of employees, including hourly wages, salaries, and other forms of compensation. This is used to analyze income inequality, measure labor costs, and assess the standard of living.

str:Code.com:Name: السكان والتركيبة السكانية
Население и демография
人口と人口統計
Population and demographics
Population et données démographiques
Población y demografía
人口与人口统计学
str:Code.com:Description: The size, structure, and distribution of a population.

str:Code.com:Name: عدد السكان
Население
人口
Population
Population
Población
人口
str:Code.com:Description: The total number of people residing in a specific geographic area, such as a country, region, or city. This is essential for demographic analysis, resource allocation, and policy planning.

str:Code.com:Name: التغير الديموغرافي
Демографические изменения
人口動態変化
Demographic change
Changement démographique
Cambio demográfico
人口变化
str:Code.com:Description: The changes in the size, composition, and distribution of a population over time. This includes information on birth rates, death rates, age structure, migration patterns, and other demographic factors.

str:Code.com:Name: الهجرة
Миграция
移住
Migration
Migration
Migración
迁移
str:Code.com:Description: The movement of people across geographical boundaries, including both internal and international migration.

str:Code.com:Name: التعليم
Образование
教育
Education
Éducation
Educación
教育
str:Code.com:Description: Education, encompassing enrollment rates, educational attainment, literacy levels, and educational expenditures.

str:Code.com:Name: الصحة
Здравоохранение
健康
Health
Santé
Salud
健康
str:Code.com:Description: The health of a population.

str:Code.com:Name: الإدماج والمساواة بين الجنسين
Инклюзивность и гендер
包容性とジェンダー
Inclusion and gender
Inclusion et genre
Inclusión y género
包容性和性别
str:Code.com:Description: Gender, encompassing measures of equality, diversity, and social participation across different demographic groups.

str:Code.com:Name: النساء
Женщины
女性
Women
Femmes
Mujeres
女性
str:Code.com:Description: The social, economic, and political status of women, including indicators of gender equality, labor force participation, education, health, and political representation.

str:Code.com:Name: تمويل الشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة
Финансирование МСП
中小企業金融
SME finance
Financement des PME
Financiación de PYME
中小企业融资
str:Code.com:Description: The financing of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), including information on loan volumes, interest rates, and access to credit.

str:Code.com:Name: التكنولوجيا
Технологии
テクノロジー
Technology
Technologie
Tecnología
科技
str:Code.com:Description: Technological innovation, adoption, and impact.

str:Code.com:Name: التكنولوجيا المالية
Финтех
フィンテック
Fintech
Fintech
Fintech
金融科技
str:Code.com:Description: Financial technology innovations, including digital payments, peer-to-peer lending, robo-advisors, and blockchain-based solutions.

str:Code.com:Name: البيئة والمناخ
Окружающая среда и климат
環境と気候
Environment and climate
Environnement et climat
Medio ambiente y clima
环境与气候
str:Code.com:Description: Environmental conditions, climate change, and natural resource use.

str:Code.com:Name: المناخ
Климат
気候
Climate
Climat
Clima
气候
str:Code.com:Description: Climate patterns, trends, and impacts.

str:Code.com:Name: تغير المناخ
Изменение климата
気候変動
Climate change
Changement climatique
Cambio climático
气候变化
str:Code.com:Description: Observed changes in temperature, precipitation, sea level, and other climate variables, as well as projections of future climate change under different scenarios.

str:Code.com:Name: الكوارث الطبيعية
Стихийные бедствия
自然災害
Natural disasters
Catastrophes naturelles
Desastres naturales
自然灾害
str:Code.com:Description: The occurrence, frequency, intensity, and impact of natural disasters, such as earthquakes, floods, droughts, storms, and wildfires.

str:Code.com:Name: التكيف مع تغير المناخ
Адаптация к изменению климата
気候変動適応
Climate change adaptation
Adaptation au changement climatique
Adaptación al cambio climático
气候变化适应
str:Code.com:Description: The strategies, measures, and investments aimed at reducing the vulnerability of natural and human systems to the impacts of climate change. This includes information on infrastructure resilience, early warning systems, and agricultural practices.

str:Code.com:Name: التخفيف من آثار تغير المناخ
Смягчение последствий изменения климата
気候変動緩和
Climate change mitigation
Atténuation du changement climatique
Mitigación del cambio climático
气候变化减缓
str:Code.com:Description: The actions taken to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and enhance carbon sinks, such as transitioning to renewable energy, improving energy efficiency, and promoting sustainable land use practices.

str:Code.com:Name: التمويل المناخي
Финансирование борьбы с изменением климата
気候ファイナンス
Climate finance
Financement climatique
Financiación climática
气候融资
str:Code.com:Description: The financial flows channeled towards climate change mitigation and adaptation projects and programs, including both public and private investments, as well as international climate finance mechanisms.

str:Code.com:Name: مخاطر المناخ
Климатические риски
気候リスク
Climate risks
Risques climatiques
Riesgos climáticos
气候风险
str:Code.com:Description: The potential adverse consequences of climate change for various sectors and systems, including physical risks (e.g., extreme weather events, sea-level rise), transition risks (e.g., policy changes, technological shifts), and liability risks (e.g., legal claims, reputational damage).

str:Code.com:Name: انبعاثات غازات الاحتباس الحراري
Выбросы парниковых газов
温室効果ガス排出量
Greenhouse gas emissions
Émissions de gaz à effet de serre
Emisiones de gases de efecto invernadero
温室气体排放
str:Code.com:Description: The amount of greenhouse gases, such as carbon dioxide, methane, and nitrous oxide, released into the atmosphere from various sources, including energy production, industry, agriculture, and transportation.

str:Code.com:Name: Climate and weather
str:Code.com:Description: The long-term patterns and average conditions of temperature, humidity, precipitation, wind, etc. in a specific region (climate), as well as the day-to-day state of the atmosphere (weather).

str:Code.com:Name: Transition to a low carbon economy
str:Code.com:Description: The global shift away from economic activities that rely heavily on fossil fuels (like coal, oil, and natural gas) and towards systems that generate minimal greenhouse gas emissions. This includes data on renewable energy adoption, energy efficiency improvements, and sustainable technology development.

str:Code.com:Name: Physical and transition risk indicators
str:Code.com:Description: Physical and transition risks related to climate change. Physical risks refer to the potential impact of climate change on physical assets, while transition risks are related to the shift to a low-carbon economy and include factors such as policy changes and technological innovations.

str:Code.com:Name: البيئة
Окружающая среда
環境
Environment
Environnement
Medio ambiente
环境
str:Code.com:Description: The natural environment and its interactions with human activities.

str:Code.com:Name: الاقتصاد والأسعار
Экономика и цены
経済と物価
Economy and prices
Économie et prix
Economía y precios
经济和价格
str:Code.com:Description: Economic activity, prices, and national accounts.

str:Code.com:Name: الحسابات القومية
Национальные счета
国民経済計算
National accounts
Comptes nationaux
Cuentas nacionales
国民账户
str:Code.com:Description: Describes and measures the economic activity of a country or region. It provides a comprehensive overview of the economy's structure, performance, and interactions between different sectors. This data is compiled within a standardized framework, the System of National Accounts (SNA).

str:Code.com:Name: الناتج المحلي الإجمالي (GDP)
Валовой внутренний продукт (ВВП)
国内総生産 (GDP)
Gross domestic product (GDP)
Produit intérieur brut (PIB)
Producto interno bruto (PIB)
国内生产总值 (GDP)
str:Code.com:Description: The total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders over a specific period.

str:Code.com:Name: الدخل القومي
Национальный доход
国民所得
National income
Revenu national
Ingreso nacional
国民收入
str:Code.com:Description: The total income earned by a country's residents, including wages, profits, rents, and interest.

str:Code.com:Name: حسابات القطاعات
Секторные счета
セクター別勘定
Sector accounts
Comptes sectoriels
Cuentas sectoriales
部门账户
str:Code.com:Description: The economic activity of specific sectors within the economy, such as agriculture, manufacturing, construction, and services.

str:Code.com:Name: الإنتاج الصناعي
Промышленное производство
工業生産
Industrial production
Production industrielle
Producción industrial
工业生产
str:Code.com:Description: The output of industrial establishments, including manufacturing, mining, and utilities. This is used to track industrial activity, assess productivity, and monitor economic cycles.

str:Code.com:Name: الأسعار
Цены
価格
Prices
Prix
Precios
价格
str:Code.com:Description: Statistical information that captures the monetary values at which goods, services, assets, or other items are bought, sold, or exchanged in a market. This can encompass various aspects of prices.

str:Code.com:Name: أسعار المستهلك
Потребительские цены
消費者物価
Consumer prices
Prix à la consommation
Precios al consumidor
消费者价格
str:Code.com:Description: The average change over time in the prices paid by consumers for a basket of goods and services.

str:Code.com:Name: أسعار المنتجين
Цены производителей
生産者物価
Producer prices
Prix à la production
Precios al productor
生产者价格
str:Code.com:Description: The average change over time in the selling prices received by domestic producers for their output.

str:Code.com:Name: أسعار العقارات
Цены на недвижимость
不動産価格
Real estate prices
Prix de l'immobilier
Precios inmobiliarios
房地产价格
str:Code.com:Description: The prices of houses, apartments, land, and other real estate properties.

str:Code.com:Name: أسعار السلع الأساسية
Цены на товары
商品価格
Commodity prices
Prix des matières premières
Precios de las materias primas
商品价格
str:Code.com:Description: The prices of raw materials and primary agricultural products, such as oil, gas, metals, grains, and livestock.

str:Code.com:Name: مؤشرات أسعار التصدير
Индексы экспортных цен
輸出価格指数
Export price indexes
Indices des prix à l'exportation
Índices de precios de exportación
出口价格指数
str:Code.com:Description: The average change in prices of goods and services exported by a country.

str:Code.com:Name: مؤشرات أسعار المنتجين (PPI)
Индексы цен производителей (PPI)
生産者物価指数 (PPI)
Producer price indexes (PPI)
Indices des prix à la production (IPP)
Índices de precios de producción (IPP)
生产者价格指数 (PPI)
str:Code.com:Description: The average change in prices received by domestic producers for their output.

str:Code.com:Name: مؤشرات أسعار الاستيراد
Индексы импортных цен
輸入価格指数
Import price indexes
Indices des prix à l'importation
Índices de precios de importación
进口价格指数
str:Code.com:Description: The average change in prices of goods and services imported by a country.

str:Code.com:Name: مؤشرات أسعار الجملة
Индексы оптовых цен
卸売物価指数
Wholesale price indexes
Indices des prix de gros
Índices de precios al por mayor
批发价格指数
str:Code.com:Description: The average change in prices of goods sold in bulk by wholesalers to retailers.

str:Code.com:Name: التجارة الدولية
Международная торговля
国際貿易
International trade
Commerce international
Comercio internacional
国际贸易
str:Code.com:Description: The exchange of goods and services between countries.

str:Code.com:Name: تجارة الخدمات
Торговля услугами
サービス貿易
Trade in services
Commerce de services
Comercio de servicios
服务贸易
str:Code.com:Description: The value of intangible services (e.g., tourism, transportation, financial services) exchanged between countries.

str:Code.com:Name: تجارة البضائع
Торговля товарами
財貿易
Trade in goods
Commerce de marchandises
Comercio de bienes
货物贸易
str:Code.com:Description: The value and volume of physical goods (e.g., merchandise, commodities) that are exported and imported.

str:Code.com:Name: الصادرات
Экспорт
輸出
Exports
Exportations
Exportaciones
出口
str:Code.com:Description: The value and volume of goods and services sold to other countries.

str:Code.com:Name: الواردات
Импорт
輸入
Imports
Importations
Importaciones
进口
str:Code.com:Description: The value and volume of goods and services purchased from other countries.

str:Code.com:Name: الإنتاج
Производство
生産
Production
Production
Producción
生产
str:Code.com:Description: The output of goods and services in various sectors of the economy.

str:Code.com:Name: السياحة
Туризм
観光
Tourism
Tourisme
Turismo
旅游
str:Code.com:Description: The number of tourists visiting a country and their spending.

str:Code.com:Name: القطاع الخارجي
Внешний сектор
対外セクター
External sector
Secteur extérieur
Sector externo
对外部门
str:Code.com:Description: International trade, balance of payments, and external debt.

str:Code.com:Name: ميزان المدفوعات
Платежный баланс
国際収支
Balance of payments
Balance des paiements
Balanza de pagos
国际收支
str:Code.com:Description: The recording of all economic transactions between residents of a country and the rest of the world over a specific period, usually a year. This includes transactions related to goods, services, income, and financial assets.

str:Code.com:Name: الحساب الجاري
Текущий счет
経常収支
Current account
Compte courant
Cuenta corriente
经常账户
str:Code.com:Description: A country's transactions with the rest of the world, including the balance of trade in goods and services, net income from abroad, and net current transfers.

str:Code.com:Name: حساب رأس المال
Счет движения капитала
資本勘定
Capital account
Compte de capital
Cuenta de capital
资本账户
str:Code.com:Description: A country's transactions related to capital transfers and the acquisition and disposal of non-produced, non-financial assets.

str:Code.com:Name: الحساب المالي
Финансовый счет
金融勘定
Financial account
Compte financier
Cuenta financiera
金融账户
str:Code.com:Description: A country's transactions related to financial assets and liabilities, including direct investment, portfolio investment, and other investments.

str:Code.com:Name: الاستثمار الأجنبي في المحافظ
Иностранные портфельные инвестиции (FPI)
外国証券投資 (FPI)
Foreign portfolio investment (FPI)
Investissement de portefeuille étranger
Inversión de cartera extranjera
外国证券投资 (FPI)
str:Code.com:Description: Cross-border investments in financial assets, such as stocks, bonds, and other securities, where investors do not have a controlling stake in the underlying companies.

str:Code.com:Name: الاستثمار الأجنبي المباشر (FDI)
Прямые иностранные инвестиции (FDI)
海外直接投資 (FDI)
Foreign direct investment (FDI)
Investissement direct étranger (IDE)
Inversión extranjera directa (IED)
外商直接投资 (FDI)
str:Code.com:Description: Cross-border investments in which an investor establishes a lasting interest in an enterprise operating in another country. This includes data on mergers and acquisitions, greenfield investments, and the establishment of subsidiaries or branches.

str:Code.com:Name: المركز الخارجي
Внешнее положение
対外ポジション
External position
Position extérieure
Posición externa
对外头寸
str:Code.com:Description: A country's overall financial position with respect to the rest of the world at a specific point in time. It combines data from the balance of payments and international investment position (IIP) to provide a snapshot of a country's external assets, liabilities, and net worth.

str:Code.com:Name: مركز الاستثمار الدولي (IIP)
Международная инвестиционная позиция (IIP)
国際投資ポジション (IIP)
International investment position (IIP)
Position extérieure globale (PEG)
Posición de inversión internacional (PII)
国际投资头寸 (IIP)
str:Code.com:Description: A country's stock of external financial assets and liabilities at a specific point in time, including direct investment, portfolio investment, other investments, and reserve assets.

str:Code.com:Name: الدين الخارجي
Внешний долг
対外債務
External debt
Dette extérieure
Deuda externa
外债
str:Code.com:Description: The total amount of money owed by a country's government, businesses, and individuals to foreign creditors.

str:Code.com:Name: القطاع المالي
Фискальный сектор
財政セクター
Fiscal sector
Secteur budgétaire
Sector fiscal
财政部门
str:Code.com:Description: Government revenue, expenditure, and debt.

str:Code.com:Name: إدارة الإيرادات
Налоговое администрирование
歳入管理
Revenue administration
Administration des recettes
Administración tributaria
税收管理
str:Code.com:Description: The collection of government revenue, primarily through taxes, fees, and other levies.

str:Code.com:Name: الإنفاق
Расходы
歳出
Expenditure
Dépenses
Gastos
支出
str:Code.com:Description: Government spending on goods, services, and transfer payments, including details on budget allocations, actual expenditures, and program outcomes.

str:Code.com:Name: الدين العام
Государственный долг
公的債務
Public debt
Dette publique
Deuda pública
公共债务
str:Code.com:Description: The total outstanding debt owed by a government, encompassing both domestic and external debt, as well as information on the types of debt instruments, interest rates, maturity profiles, and debt-to-GDP ratios.

str:Code.com:Name: القطاع المالي والنقدي
Финансовый и денежный сектор
金融・金融セクター
Financial and monetary sector
Secteur financier et monétaire
Sector financiero y monetario
金融和货币部门
str:Code.com:Description: Financial institutions, monetary aggregates, and interest rates.

str:Code.com:Name: صرف العملات الأجنبية
Валютный обмен
外国為替
Foreign exchange
Change étranger
Divisas
外汇
str:Code.com:Description: The exchange rates between different currencies, including spot rates, forward rates, and exchange rate regimes, as well as information on foreign exchange reserves, capital flows, and international trade.

str:Code.com:Name: الاحتياطيات الدولية
Международные резервы
外貨準備
International reserves
Réserves internationales
Reservas internacionales
国际储备
str:Code.com:Description: A country's holdings of external assets, such as foreign currencies, gold, and Special Drawing Rights (SDRs), held by the central bank to meet external financial obligations and stabilize exchange rates.

str:Code.com:Name: أسعار الصرف
Обменные курсы
為替レート
Exchange rates
Taux de change
Tipos de cambio
汇率
str:Code.com:Description: The price of one currency in terms of another, reflecting the value of a currency relative to other currencies. This includes spot exchange rates, forward rates, and exchange rate regimes.

str:Code.com:Name: البنوك المركزية
Центральные банки
中央銀行
Central banks
Banques centrales
Bancos centrales
中央银行
str:Code.com:Description: The activities of central banks, such as monetary policy decisions, interest rate setting, open market operations, reserve management, and financial stability measures.

str:Code.com:Name: الخدمات المصرفية
Банковское дело
銀行業務
Banking
Services bancaires
Banca
银行业
str:Code.com:Description: The activities and performance of the banking sector, including assets, liabilities, capital, deposits, loans, and profitability. This is used to monitor the health and stability of the banking system.

str:Code.com:Name: الميزانية العمومية للبنك المركزي
Баланс центрального банка
中央銀行のバランスシート
Central bank balance sheet
Bilan de la banque centrale
Balance de la banca central
中央银行资产负债表
str:Code.com:Description: The assets and liabilities of the central bank, including foreign reserves, government securities, and loans to commercial banks. This provides insights into the central bank's monetary policy operations and its role in the economy.

str:Code.com:Name: ائتمان البنك المركزي
Кредит центрального банка
中央銀行信用
Central bank credit
Crédit de la banque centrale
Crédito de la banca central
中央银行信贷
str:Code.com:Description: The credit extended by the central bank to the banking sector and the government, including discount window lending, repurchase agreements, and emergency lending facilities.

str:Code.com:Name: الأسواق المالية والخدمات والأدوات المالية
Финансовые рынки, услуги и инструменты
金融市場、サービス、および金融商品
Financial markets, services and instruments
Marchés, services et instruments financiers
Mercados, servicios e instrumentos financieros
金融市场、服务和工具
str:Code.com:Description: The trading and pricing of financial assets, such as stocks, bonds, derivatives, and currencies, as well as information on financial institutions, market infrastructure, and regulatory frameworks.

str:Code.com:Name: الأدوات المالية
Финансовые инструменты
金融商品
Financial instruments
Instruments financiers
Instrumentos financieros
金融工具
str:Code.com:Description: Various financial instruments, such as stocks, bonds, derivatives, and other securities, including their issuance, trading volumes, prices, and returns.

str:Code.com:Name: القروض
Кредиты
ローン
Loans
Prêts
Préstamos
贷款
str:Code.com:Description: The amount of credit extended by financial institutions to households and businesses, including information on loan types, interest rates, maturity profiles, and credit quality.

str:Code.com:Name: التأمين
Страхование
保険
Insurance
Assurance
Seguros
保险
str:Code.com:Description: The insurance sector, including premiums, claims, assets, liabilities, and profitability of insurance companies.

str:Code.com:Name: أسعار الفائدة
Процентные ставки
金利
Interest rates
Taux d'intérêt
Tasas de interés
利率
str:Code.com:Description: The cost of borrowing and the return on savings, typically expressed as a percentage of the principal amount. This includes data on various interest rate benchmarks, such as the policy rate set by the central bank, interbank rates, and lending rates for different types of borrowers.

str:Code.com:Name: الوصول إلى التمويل
Финансовый доступ
金融アクセス
Financial access
Accès financier
Acceso financiero
金融服务
str:Code.com:Description: The availability and affordability of financial services, such as bank accounts, credit, insurance, and payment systems, for individuals and businesses.

str:Code.com:Name: استقرار القطاع المالي
Стабильность финансового сектора
金融セクターの安定性
Financial sector stability
Stabilité du secteur financier
Estabilidad del sector financiero
金融部门稳定性
str:Code.com:Description: The resilience of the financial system to shocks and its ability to withstand financial stress, including indicators of asset quality, capital adequacy, liquidity, profitability, and risk management practices of financial institutions.

str:Code.com:Name: تقييم الاستقرار المالي
Оценка финансовой стабильности
金融安定性評価
Financial stability assessment
Évaluation de la stabilité financière
Evaluación de la estabilidad financiera
金融稳定评估
str:Code.com:Description: The evaluation of the resilience of the financial system to shocks and its ability to withstand financial stress. This includes indicators of asset quality, capital adequacy, liquidity, profitability, and risk management practices of financial institutions.

str:Code.com:Name: الملاءة المالية
Платежеспособность
支払能力
Solvency
Solvabilité
Solvencia
偿付能力
str:Code.com:Description: The ability of a financial institution or a government to meet its long-term financial obligations, including the payment of interest and principal on debt.

str:Code.com:Name: اختبارات تحمل الضغوط
Стресс-тестирование
ストレステスト
Stress testing
Tests de résistance
Pruebas de resistencia
压力测试
str:Code.com:Description: The simulation of adverse economic scenarios to assess the resilience of financial institutions and the broader financial system to potential shocks.

str:Code.com:Name: المخاطر الجهازية
Системный риск
システミック・リスク
Systemic risk
Risque systémique
Riesgo sistémico
系统性风险
str:Code.com:Description: The risk of a widespread disruption to the financial system that could have severe consequences for the broader economy. This includes indicators of interconnectedness, leverage, and concentration in the financial system.

str:Code.com:Name: مخاطر القطاع المالي
Риск финансового сектора
金融セクターリスク
Financial sector risk
Risque du secteur financier
Riesgo del sector financiero
金融部门风险
str:Code.com:Description: The specific risks faced by different types of financial institutions, such as credit risk, market risk, operational risk, and liquidity risk.

str:Code.com:Name: الأوراق المالية
Ценные бумаги
証券
Securities
Titres financiers
Valores
证券
str:Code.com:Description: Financial instruments that represent ownership in a company (stocks) or debt obligations (bonds). This includes information on issuance, trading volumes, prices, and returns.

str:Code.com:Name: الودائع
Депозиты
預金
Deposits
Dépôts
Depósitos
存款
str:Code.com:Description: The funds held by individuals and businesses in bank accounts, including demand deposits, time deposits, and savings accounts.

str:Code.com:Name: المشتقات المالية
Финансовые деривативы
金融派生商品
Financial derivatives
Produits dérivés financiers
Derivados financieros
金融衍生品
str:Code.com:Description: Financial contracts whose value is derived from an underlying asset, such as stocks, bonds, commodities, or currencies.

str:Code.com:Name: المؤسسات المالية
Финансовые учреждения
金融機関
Financial institutions
Institutions financières
Instituciones financieras
金融机构
str:Code.com:Description: The financial activities and performance of banks, insurance companies, pension funds, investment funds, and other financial intermediaries, including balance sheets, income statements, and risk exposures.

str:Code.com:Name: البنوك التجارية
Коммерческие банки
商業銀行
Commercial banks
Banques commerciales
Bancos comerciales
商业银行
str:Code.com:Description: The financial activities and performance of commercial banks, which are the primary providers of credit and deposit services to households and businesses. This includes balance sheets, income statements, and risk exposures.

str:Code.com:Name: المؤسسات المالية غير المصرفية
Небанковские финансовые учреждения
ノンバンク金融機関
Nonbank financial institutions
Institutions financières non bancaires
Instituciones financieras no bancarias
非银行金融机构
str:Code.com:Description: The activities and performance of financial institutions that are not banks, such as insurance companies, pension funds, investment funds, and other financial intermediaries.

str:Code.com:Name: السياسة النقدية
Монетарная политика
金融政策
Monetary policy
Politique monétaire
Política monetaria
货币政策
str:Code.com:Description: The actions taken by central banks to influence the availability and cost of money in the economy, such as interest rate changes, quantitative easing, and other monetary policy tools.

str:Code.com:Name: متطلبات الاحتياطي
Требования к резервам
預金準備率
Reserve requirements
Réserves obligatoires
Requisitos de reserva
法定存款准备金
str:Code.com:Description: The minimum amount of reserves that banks are required to hold against their deposits, as mandated by the central bank.

str:Code.com:Name: النقود
Деньги
マネー
Money
Monnaie
Dinero
货币
str:Code.com:Description: The various forms of money in circulation, including currency, demand deposits, and other liquid assets.

str:Code.com:Name: المجاميع النقدية
Денежные агрегаты
マネタリー・アグリゲーツ
Monetary aggregates
Agrégats monétaires
Agregados monetarios
货币总量
str:Code.com:Description: The total stock of money in circulation, including currency in circulation, demand deposits, and other liquid assets. Monetary aggregates are used as indicators of economic activity and to gauge the impact of monetary policy.

str:Code.com:Name: القاعدة النقدية
Денежная база
マネタリーベース
Monetary base
Base monétaire
Base monetaria
货币基础
str:Code.com:Description: The total amount of currency in circulation and reserves held by commercial banks at the central bank. The monetary base is a key component of the money supply and is directly controlled by the central bank.

str:Code.com:Name: إجماليات الائتمان
Кредитные агрегаты
信用総量
Credit aggregates
Agrégats de crédit
Agregados crediticios
信贷总量
str:Code.com:Description: The total amount of credit outstanding in the economy, including loans to households, businesses, and the government.

str:Code.com:Name: التحليل المالي الكلي
Макрофинансовый анализ
マクロ金融分析
Macrofinancial analysis
Analyse macrofinancière
Análisis macrofinanciero
宏观金融分析
str:Code.com:Description: The assessment of the overall health and stability of a country's financial system, including its interactions with the broader economy. This encompasses indicators of credit growth, asset prices, capital flows, and other financial variables that can affect economic stability.

str:Code.com:Name: الدورات المالية
Финансовые циклы
金融サイクル
Financial cycles
Cycles financiers
Ciclos financieros
金融周期
str:Code.com:Description: The fluctuations in financial variables over time, such as credit growth, asset prices, and leverage.

str:Code.com:Name: الروابط المالية الكلية
Макрофинансовые связи
マクロ金融リンケージ
Macrofinancial linkages
Liens macrofinanciers
Vínculos macrofinancieros
宏观金融联系
str:Code.com:Description: The interconnections between the financial sector and the broader economy, including the transmission channels through which financial shocks can affect economic activity and vice versa.

str:Code.com:Name: السياسة الاحترازية الكلية
Макропруденциальная политика
マクロプルーデンス政策
Macroprudential policy
Politique macroprudentielle
Política macroprudencial
宏观审慎政策
str:Code.com:Description: Policies and regulations designed to mitigate systemic risks in the financial system, such as capital requirements, leverage ratios, and borrower-based measures.

str:Code.com:Name: أدوات السياسة الاحترازية الكلية
Макропруденциальные инструменты политики
マクロプルーデンス政策手段
Macroprudential policy instruments
Instruments de politique macroprudentielle
Instrumentos de política macroprudencial
宏观审慎政策工具
str:Code.com:Description: The specific tools used by policymakers to mitigate systemic risks in the financial system, such as capital buffers, leverage ratios, and borrower-based measures.

str:Code.com:Name: التحليل الاحترازي الكلي
Макропруденциальный анализ
マクロプルーデンス分析
Macroprudential analysis
Analyse macroprudentielle
Análisis macroprudencial
宏观审慎分析
str:Code.com:Description: The assessment of systemic risks and vulnerabilities in the financial system, using both quantitative and qualitative methods.

str:Code.com:Name: الرقابة والتنظيم الماليين
Финансовый надзор и регулирование
金融監督と規制
Financial supervision and regulation
Supervision et réglementation financières
Supervisión y regulación financieras
金融监管
str:Code.com:Description: The oversight and enforcement activities of regulatory bodies overseeing financial institutions and markets. This includes information on regulatory frameworks, supervisory practices, and enforcement actions.

str:Code.com:Name: تنظيم البنوك
Банковское регулирование
銀行規制
Bank regulation
Réglementation bancaire
Regulación bancaria
银行监管
str:Code.com:Description: The rules and regulations governing the operations of banks, including capital requirements, liquidity requirements, and risk management standards.

str:Code.com:Name: إدارة مخاطر البنوك
Управление банковскими рисками
銀行リスク管理
Bank risk management
Gestion des risques bancaires
Gestión de riesgos bancarios
银行风险管理
str:Code.com:Description: The practices and procedures used by banks to identify, assess, and mitigate risks, such as credit risk, market risk, operational risk, and liquidity risk.

str:Code.com:Name: الإشراف على المؤسسات المالية غير المصرفية
Надзор за небанковскими финансовыми учреждениями
ノンバンク金融機関監督
Nonbank financial institution supervision
Supervision des institutions financières non bancaires
Supervisión de instituciones financieras no bancarias
非银行金融机构监管
str:Code.com:Description: The oversight and regulation of nonbank financial institutions, such as insurance companies, pension funds, and investment funds.

str:Code.com:Name: إدارة الأصول والخصوم
Управление активами и пассивами (ALM)
資産負債管理
Asset and liability management (ALM)
Gestion actif-passif
Gestión de activos y pasivos
资产负债管理
str:Code.com:Description: The strategies and practices employed by financial institutions to manage their assets and liabilities, including interest rate risk, liquidity risk, and credit risk. This is used to assess the effectiveness of ALM in maintaining financial soundness.

str:Code.com:Name: مقاييس مخاطر الخصوم
Меры риска обязательств
負債リスク指標
Liability risk measures
Mesures du risque de passif
Medidas de riesgo de pasivo
负债风险度量
str:Code.com:Description: Various measures used to assess the riskiness of an institution's liabilities, such as the maturity mismatch between assets and liabilities, the volatility of funding sources, and the potential for runs on deposits.

str:Code.com:Name: التوقعات والتحليلات الاقتصادية
Экономические прогнозы и анализ
経済予測と分析
Economic forecasts and analysis
Prévisions et analyses économiques
Previsiones y análisis económicos
经济预测与分析
str:Code.com:Description: Economic forecasts, policy analysis, and other economic research.

str:Code.com:Name: التنبؤ الاقتصادي
Экономическое прогнозирование
経済予測
Economic forecasting
Prévisions économiques
Previsiones económicas
经济预测
str:Code.com:Description: Economic forecasts for various countries and regions.

str:Code.com:Name: حسابات الصندوق
Счета фонда
基金勘定
Fund accounts
Comptes de fonds
Cuentas de fondos
基金账户
str:Code.com:Description: The IMF's financial accounts and resources.

str:Code.com:Name: البيانات المالية لصندوق النقد الدولي
Финансовые данные МВФ
IMF金融データ
IMF Financial data
Données financières du FMI
Datos financieros del FMI
国际货币基金组织金融数据
str:Code.com:Description: The IMF's financial operations and lending activities.

str:Code.com:Name: تقارير مراقبة صندوق النقد الدولي
Отчеты МВФ о мониторинге
IMFサーベイランスレポート
IMF Surveillance reports
Rapports de surveillance du FMI
Informes de vigilancia del FMI
国际货币基金组织监督报告
str:Code.com:Description: Reports on the IMF's surveillance of member countries' economic and financial policies.

str:Code.com:Name: Working papers datasets
str:Code.com:Description: Datasets relating to working papers, which are typically preliminary research papers that present new findings, methodologies, or analysis for academic or policy-related discussion.

str:Code.com:Name: International Financial Statistics (IFS)
str:Code.com:Description: Datasets underlying the International Financial Statistics, one of the Fund’s principal statistical compilations. Available since 1948, it has broad geographic and conceptual coverage.

str:Code.com:Name: World Economic Outlook (WEO)
str:Code.com:Description: Datasets related to the World Economic Outlook and Regional Economic Outlooks
